data.name: 9ReasonsToChooseAbu
data.value: 9 reasons to choose ABU:

data.name: AduAdvantages
data.value: Advantages ABU

data.name: Advantage1
data.value: High ratio of capturing a wide range of harmful substances.

data.name: Advantage10Description
data.value: Since the beginning of operation (since 1989), there has not been a single complaint regarding any of the operated ABUs. ABU does not have any moving or wearing parts (except for a conventional water pump). The unit service life is at least 20 years.

data.name: Advantage10Title
data.value: Quality and reliability

data.name: Advantage1Description
data.value: The degree of capturing a wide range of harmful substances from the ventilation air is from 80 to 99.9%, depending on the input concentrations and the physical-chemical properties of the harmful substances.

data.name: Advantage1Title
data.value: Efficiency

data.name: Advantage2
data.value: Reliability and efficiency is proved by 25 years of experience.

data.name: Advantage2Description
data.value: Presence of solid impurities in the gas flow does not affect the functional characteristics. Ion exchange filters, units with gas-discharge cells, coals, zeolites, catalysts or other «dry« devices are meaningless in this situation because of sticking of resinous and suspended substances to the working surfaces.

data.name: Advantage2Title
data.value: Can purify ventilation air containing resinous and suspended substances

data.name: Advantage3
data.value: Low operating costs.

data.name: Advantage3Description
data.value: Low operating costs because of the small amount consumables needed (technical water for feed - 0.1-1 m<sup>3</sup>/day, biogenic additives - 30-60 kg/year, compressed air 30-40 m<sup>3</sup>/h).

data.name: Advantage3Title
data.value: Economic factors

data.name: Advantage4
data.value: Absence of chemical reagents, acids or alkalis.

data.name: Advantage4Description
data.value: ABUs are environmentally friendly, since they do not create secondary contaminants (for example, during thermal and catalytically assisted combustion - NOx, CO and partial oxidation products are released; during coal-based adsorption - contaminated condensate after regeneration with superheated steam; during ozonation - excess ozone; during chemisorption - spent saline solution and drift of chemical reagents drops into the atmosphere) and help improve the ecological situation in the region.

data.name: Advantage4Title
data.value: Environmental friendliness

data.name: Advantage5
data.value: Minimal maintenance required.

data.name: Advantage5Description
data.value: The units are explosion- and flameproof. Chemical reagents, acids and alkali are not used.

data.name: Advantage5Title
data.value: Safety

data.name: Advantage6
data.value: Absence of wearing or replaceable parts.

data.name: Advantage6Description
data.value: ABU operation can significantly reduce the risk of occupational diseases for employees involved in hazardous production.

data.name: Advantage6Title
data.value: Health

data.name: Advantage7
data.value: ABU service life is at least 20 years.

data.name: Advantage7Description
data.value: The units are easy to operate and do not require a permanent operator. During the ABU installation, our specialists will provide the necessary instructions and full information to your personnel.

data.name: Advantage7Title
data.value: Training

data.name: Advantage8
data.value: Development of non-standard solutions.

data.name: Advantage8Description1
data.value: ABU maintenance is minimal and is only related to the pump repair.

data.name: Advantage8Description2
data.value: Monitoring of the efficiency of ventilation emissions purification is carried out periodically, visually, by the state of irrigation and «boiling» of the nozzle. The absorption solution is analyzed for chemical oxygen consumption once a month. If the absorbent regeneration efficiency needs to be improved, available agricultural fertilizers containing nitrogen and phosphorus are added to the solution.

data.name: Advantage8Title
data.value: Maintenance and monitoring

data.name: Advantage9
data.value: Support and technical consultations through the whole life cycle.

data.name: Advantage9Description
data.value: More than 100 ABUs are operated by 42 companies in various industries in Russia, Belarus, Ukraine and Kyrgyzstan with a lifetime of up to 25 years.

data.name: Advantage9Title
data.value: Practical use
